This is following up on discussions we had about splitting this mono repo up.
The main tasks I recall are:

recipe-client, moving to the Tree and deployed on Firefox train schedule
recipe-server, stays here and this repo becomes recipe-server. Or we can make a new repo named normandy-recipe-server?
normandy-admin, deprecate / phase out in favor of all UI living in Delivery Dashboard
mozjexl -> new repo
shield icon generator (svg)
??? others?

There are a lot of details on actually accomplishing any of the above.  Creating this issue to discuss at a high level.  I think The Breakup should be a high priority and done soon as possible.

title: [meta] Break up the monorepo
body:
This is following up on discussions we had about splitting this mono repo up.  

The main tasks I recall are: 

1.  recipe-client, moving to the Tree and deployed on Firefox train schedule
1.  recipe-server, stays here and this repo becomes recipe-server. Or we can make a new repo named normandy-recipe-server? 
1.  normandy-admin, deprecate / phase out in favor of all UI living in [Delivery Dashboard](https://github.com/mozilla/delivery-dashboard)
1.  mozjexl -> new repo 
1. shield icon generator (svg)
1. ??? others?

There are a lot of details on actually accomplishing any of the above.  Creating this issue to discuss at a high level.  I think The Breakup should be a high priority and done soon as possible.
